title: Kristen Faulkner Moves up to 4th in Tour de France Femmes: ‘I’m Not Going to Waste Good Legs’
content:
Faulkner talks GC prospects and reflects on 'super fun', rain-sodden stage into Liège as EF-Oatly-Cannondale put three in front group, showing strength in depth.

Read the full article at Kristen Faulkner Moves up to 4th in Tour de France Femmes: ‘I’m Not Going to Waste Good Legs’ on Velo.
author: Andy McGrath
